nodes.text: The Dread Fortress was the bastion of the Dread Masters on the Outer Rim moon of Oricon,

This is where they regrouped following the death of one of their number, Dread Master Styrak, in 3638 BBY during the Battle of Darvannis. Later that year both the Sith Empire and Republic tracked them to their moon. Both factions sent strike teams into the fortress, where the Dread Master's forces made their last stand.
